awd_titl_txt: Characterization of Subsurface Materials Using Artificial   Neural Networks
awd_abstract_narration: In this project a method of pattern completion based on networks                of artificial neurons (neural networks) will be employed. The                   artificial neural network, in effect, extracts the statistics of                the spatially distributed field from punctual observations and                  enables the field to be estimated at unobserved locations. The                  method has some characteristics similar to kriging, but evolves                 from a completely different perspective,. It also bears many                    striking similarities to discriminant analysis. This similarity                 is exploited to provide a method of generating random field                     samples for Monte Carlo simulation that are conditioned on                      information,. The methods can be implemented very efficiently on                massively parallel computers and are amenable, in principle, to                 implementation in computer hardware.
